text: Hybrid is a British electronic band consisting of Mike and Charlotte Truman. It was created in 1995 by Mike Truman, Chris Healings, and Lee Mullin. Their 1999 single, "Finished Symphony" was their first charting release and their debut studio album, Wide Angle, was released that year to critical acclaim. Hybrid are considered pioneers of the early electronic genre, and are known for their electronic approach to their production, specifically with the use of electronic sounds. Their second studio album, Morning Sci-Fi (2003), was featured collaborations with Peter Hook and Kirsty Hawkshaw. In 2006, Truman and Healings released their acclaimed third studio album I Choose Noise. == References == Category:Electronic music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1995 Category:Musical duos Category:Musical trios Category:1990s establishments in England Category:English musical groups Category:Musical groups established in the 1990s
title: Hybrid (band)
